description: Risa is http://anidb.net/ch8585 [Rin]`s mother and http://anidb.net/ch44091 [Ritsu]`s daughter. As she married her husband Tadanori at the age of 18 already she looks more like an older sister of Rin. Risa wants a heir for the family and thus encourages Rin to get closer to http://anidb.net/ch8589 [Ikuto].
name: Risa
